text: @gsgarima36 @old_india @SetuAarogya @narendramodi Self certification of Covid-19 via aarogyasetu app is one of the most nonsense concepts in modern times. It's a pity that none of the top technolpgy companies in India @Wipro @TCS and @InfyFoundation came forward to help govt in this hour of need.
